amendment.description: To eliminate funding for the Small Community Air Service Development Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 801 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 192.

action.text: Amendment SA 801 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6808-6809; text: CR S6809) To eliminate funding for the Small Community Air Service Development Program.
